name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical drink with rum and orgeat syrup.

name: Pina Colada
description: A creamy tropical cocktail with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A sweet and tart cocktail with cranberry juice.

name: Margarita
description: A tangy cocktail with lime and orange liqueur.

name: Negroni
description: A bitter cocktail with gin, Campari, and vermouth.

name: Boulevardier
description: A whiskey-based cocktail with Campari and vermouth.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A classic cocktail with whiskey, bitters, sugar, and a twist of citrus.

name: Tom Collins
description: A refreshing cocktail with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and soda water.

name: Bloody Mary
description: A savory cocktail with vodka, tomato juice, and various spices.
